content.text: Match ends, Sunderland 0, Swansea City 2.
Second Half ends, Sunderland 0, Swansea City 2.
Attempt saved. Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sebastian Larsson.
Substitution, Swansea City. Luciano Narsingh replaces Fernando Llorente.
Fabio Borini (Sunderland) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Martin Olsson (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fabio Borini (Sunderland).
Foul by Javier Manquillo (Sunderland).
Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Darron Gibson (Sunderland) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Darron Gibson (Sunderland).
Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Martin Olsson.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Federico Fernández.
Attempt blocked. Jermain Defoe (Sunderland) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fabio Borini.
Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland).
Substitution, Swansea City. Jack Cork replaces Leon Britton.
Offside, Sunderland. Sebastian Larsson tries a through ball, but Jermain Defoe is caught offside.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Alfie Mawson.
Foul by Sebastian Larsson (Sunderland).
Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Martin Olsson.
Hand ball by Jordan Ayew (Swansea City).
Attempt missed. Billy Jones (Sunderland) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Attempt saved. Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Fabio Borini (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Swansea City. Leroy Fer replaces Ki Sung-yueng.
Offside, Sunderland. Darron Gibson tries a through ball, but Didier Ndong is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Sebastian Larsson with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Alfie Mawson.
Attempt blocked. Fabio Borini (Sunderland) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked. Assisted by Billy Jones.
Foul by Fabio Borini (Sunderland).
Leon Britton (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Alfie Mawson.

Foul by Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland).
Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Sebastian Larsson (Sunderland) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Federico Fernández (Swansea City).
Jermain Defoe (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Swansea City. Fernando Llorente tries a through ball, but Jordan Ayew is caught offside.
Hand ball by Wahbi Khazri (Sunderland).
Second Half begins Sunderland 0, Swansea City 2.
First Half ends, Sunderland 0, Swansea City 2.
Goal!  Sunderland 0, Swansea City 2. Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Ki Sung-yueng.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Javier Manquillo.
Foul by Billy Jones (Sunderland).
Martin Olsson (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Sunderland. Wahbi Khazri replaces Victor Anichebe because of an injury.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Lukasz Fabianski.
Attempt saved. Jermain Defoe (Sunderland) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Billy Jones.
Attempt missed. Billy Jones (Sunderland) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sebastian Larsson with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Tom Carroll.
Foul by Billy Jones (Sunderland).
Martin Olsson (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Billy Jones (Sunderland) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Javier Manquillo with a cross.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Victor Anichebe (Sunderland) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Fabio Borini (Sunderland) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the left.
Billy Jones (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Sunderland 0, Swansea City 1. Fernando Llorente (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross following a set piece situation.
Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Victor Anichebe (Sunderland).
